pages.text: $(thing)$(l:rituals/crafting/craft_storage_stabilizer_tier1)Storage Stabilizers(/l)$() increase the storage space in the storage dimension. There are four tiers, each adding more slots than the last. Storage controllers need to point at the Dimensional Matrix (one block above the Storage Actuator) and cannot be more than 5 blocks away.
The red lines illustrate the line of sight, they will not show up in game!
